patthana15.66:1.1: Pariyāpannaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Apariyāpannaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.66:2.1: Pariyāpannaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Abyākatamūlaṃ dve paccayavasena.)
